Title: The Lesson of Dry Fur
Description:
Through meditation, I intend to find a route to locating Shu. In the meantime, you would benefit from practice and discipline.

Your first task is the task of all trainees entering the pools: cross the balance poles to the west and ring the bell without falling into the pool.

Should you fall, the pool's curse will make it difficult to get on a pole again, so you will need to return to the edge of the pool to start over.

Oh, and beware the cranes.
ObjectivesText: Cross the balance poles and ring the training bell.
